Lyric:
[by:莎士比亚书店]
[00:08.12]You with the sad eyes
[00:12.35]Don't be discouraged
[00:14.71]Though I realize it's hard to take courage
[00:20.30]In a world full of people
[00:23.42]You can lose sight of it all
[00:26.21]And the darkness inside you makes you feel so small
[00:31.19]But I see your true colours shining through
[00:37.05]I see your true colours and that's why I love you
[00:43.52]So don't be afraid to let them show
[00:49.18]Your true colours, true colours are beautiful
[01:10.57]Show me a smile and don't be unhappy
[01:17.17]Can't remember when I last saw you laughing
[01:22.83]If this world makes you crazy and you've taken all you can bear
[01:29.33]You call me up cos you know I'll be there
[01:33.56]And I see your true colours shining through
[01:39.24]I see your true colours and that's why I love you
[01:45.41]So don't be afraid to let them show
[01:51.22]Your true colours are beautiful
